briefdescription.para: Returns a string containing the full name of the current function using compiler-specific macros.

simplesect.para: std::string containing the full name of the current function.

briefdescription.para: Returns a compiler-specific prefix string for template type T.

simplesect.para: std::string containing compiler-specific prefix for template type T.

briefdescription.para: Returns a string suffix for function names based on compiler type.

simplesect.para: std::string containing either "]" (for Clang) or ";" (for GCC).

briefdescription.para: Determines and returns the name of class XClassType as a string for postprocessing in MHO.

simplesect.para: std::string containing the name of class XClassType

briefdescription.para: Specialization for std::string to return class name prefix.

simplesect.para: std::string containing compiler-specific prefix for class name.

briefdescription.para: Returns a string representation of the compiler name for given template type XClassType.

simplesect.para: std::string containing the compiler name prefixed by type information

briefdescription.para: Extracts and strips spaces from class name in compiler function for given XClassType.

simplesect.para: String containing class name without spaces

briefdescription.para: Extracts and returns the name of a class when used within a std::tuple<.

simplesect.para: std::string containing the class name without spaces
